allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Replace loading spinner with skeleton and blur effect

- Remove full-page loading spinner
- Show page structure immediately with skeleton loaders
- Apply blur effect to content while loading
- Smooth transitions when data loads
- Better perceived performance and user experience")

Bash(git commit -m "Add support for label_created status and capitalize all status displays

- Handle label_created delivery status from Firestore  
- Map label_created to show as ''Label Created'' in UI
- Capitalize all status displays (payment, fulfillment, delivery, SLA)
- Add debug logging for delivery status
- Ensure label_created doesn''t count as shipped for SLA")

Bash(git commit -m "Add support for label_created status and capitalize all status displays

- Handle label_created delivery status from Firestore  
- Map label_created to show as ''Label Created'' in UI
- Capitalize all status displays (payment, fulfillment, delivery, SLA)
- Add debug logging for delivery status
- Ensure label_created doesn''t count as shipped for SLA")

Bash(git commit -m "Update sync utility to handle tracking_added delivery status from Shopify

- Check for delivery_status field on Shopify fulfillments
- Check for delivery_status field on Shopify line items  
- Default to tracking_added if tracking number exists without shipment status
- Add console logging to help debug delivery status syncing")
